title: Two Sum
description:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return the indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order.

Input Format

The first line contains two integers n (the length of the array) and target. The second line contains n space-separated integers representing the array.

Output Format

Print two space-separated integers representing the indices (0-indexed) of the two numbers that add up to target.
